title: Deep Generative Multimedia Children's Literature
abstract: Artistic work leveraging Machine Learning techniques is an increasingly popular endeavour for those with a creative lean. However, most work is done in a single domain: text, images, music, etc. In this work, I design a system for a machine learning created multimedia experience, specifically in the genre of children's literature. We detail the process for exclusively using publicly available pretrained deep neural network based models, I present multiple examples of the work my system creates, and I explore the problems associated in this area of creative work.
